title: nambide ninna pAda
sahitya:
nambide ninna pAda.  rAgA:  shankarAbharaNa.  aTa tALA.


caraNam 1    nambide ninna pAda narasimha enna bembiDade salahayya narasimha 
hambalisuvenu balu narasimha pAda nambidavaranu kAyo narasimha
    caraNam 2    tumburu nAradapriya narasimha celva shambarAriya pitane narasimha 
ambarISaNa kAide narasimha jagadamba ramaNane siri narasimha
    caraNam 3    bAla karedalli bande narasimha bhakta pAlipa dayALu siri narasimha 
lIleyinda hiraNyana narasimha konda lOla siriyarasane narasimha
    caraNam 4    acyutAnanta gOvinda narasimha siri saccidAnanda mukunda narasimha 
kiccinandadi bende narasimha bhava vicceyinda biDisayya narasimha
    caraNam 5    karimoreyanu kELi narasimha balu bharadindodagi bande narasimha 
garuDa vAhananAgi narasimha uddharisi kAyodeyallo narasimha
    caraNam 6    dEvara dEvanu nInE narasimha bEre kAvaranu kANenayya narasimha 
bhAvajanayyane siri narasimha ninna sEveya pAlisi kAyO narasimha
    caraNam 7    tande tAyi guru daiva narasimha enna bandhu baLagavu nIne narasimha 
kundu heccu nODa bEDa narasimha purandara viTTala kAyo narasimha
